extendedInfo.description: International Boxing ChampionsNEW GAME MODE!MULTIPLAYER TOURNAMENT!Compete online to win prizes with Skillz!Heyzap enabled. Now you can test your scores against everyone in the world. Your victories will be scored on Points, Combos, Aggression, Time, Arrogance, Old School, Flawless and Damage taken. Upload to Heyzap to see how good you really are!Pocket-Change enabled, now every time you play you'll earn points towards real rewards, from an amazon gift card to an xBox or Beats headphones!Online Multiplayer beta live now! and the server is currently unlocked!No code required!3 game288 Medals5 UPS power supply9 Super ComboLow graphics and sound options, low-power mobile phone.Classic arcade action.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I think this is a really cool game andim going to continue to play great job GREAT FUN ENTERTAINING GAME AWSOME!!!!
reviews.author: Kambriah Russell

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.comment: Excellent for a good time, very responsive and good gameplay. Loved it!!
reviews.author: Jose Rodriguez Suero

reviews.title: Unstable
reviews.comment: The game crashes a lot. I\'ll be in the middle of a game and the app will just stop. If I leave the game and try to start it back up it will say ICB has stopped workiing and I have start my whole career over.
reviews.author: Rohit Gupta

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Only problem is you can\'t move side to side. But its still hands down the best boxing game by far. I will try my best to recommended it to everyone and promote it. Maybe you can include side movement and character customization in the next installment but other than that just keep doing what your doing guys
reviews.author: DeeDee Vicodenz

reviews.title: Great game a must have!
reviews.comment: Love this game,I box at the gym so it was a must have for me..wish my player wasn\'t just a shadow,but I still love it..
reviews.author: Emetrius Johnson

reviews.title: 1 star
reviews.comment: This game is all about money latest update is full of crappy ads.........1 star for this -_-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: First division was fun . but fighting the second .  division is laughable the first opponet does 10x my damage which isn\'t that bad because I don\'t get hit a lot but its nearly impossible to knock down oponents come on 15hooks in a row should floor him instead I can see no damage

reviews.title: Good graphics..... very good and fun app.
reviews.comment: Great view of boxers fun app.... good graphics ........

reviews.title: Mangla Media
reviews.comment: Good game, good visuals with great gameplay just a shame about the primitive edit options. Since last update I can\'t stop the menu music to stop playing in the background so had to restart tablet to get rid of itso your better off getting rid of game now as it won\'t start on a tablet.

reviews.author: ha teedu

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: Its a good game I whish u could add a sway feature like to dodge side to side I would like that.  Also money for upgrades is kind of hard to get at times.  If nu could also add like 2 or 3 more tournaments and have us fight according to weight class that would be cool.  I will support this app because it is new and interesting and i like it.  Please consider all the things I said above.  PS fix multi play.
